corpus_metadata.name: Healthcare HIPAA Compliance RAG Corpus
corpus_metadata.purpose: Tier 2 escalation policy knowledge base for healthcare TELOS governance

required_fields.title: Full document title
required_fields.category: One of: privacy_regulation, clinical_guideline, consent_framework, incident_protocol
required_fields.source: Authoritative organization (e.g., HHS OCR, CDC, WHO, AMA)
required_fields.applicable_scenarios: List of scenarios where this document is authoritative
required_fields.hipaa_relevance: How this relates to HIPAA compliance
required_fields.escalation_triggers: When this document should be retrieved in Tier 2

privacy_regulation.description: Federal and state privacy laws, regulations, and guidance documents
examples: State privacy laws (CA CMIA, TX HB 300)

clinical_guideline.description: Evidence-based clinical practice guidelines from authoritative medical organizations

consent_framework.description: Informed consent, patient autonomy, and medical ethics frameworks

incident_protocol.description: Healthcare incident reporting, breach notification, and adverse event protocols

quality_criteria.authority: Only documents from recognized authoritative sources
quality_criteria.recency: Prefer documents updated within last 5 years
quality_criteria.comprehensiveness: Complete coverage of topic, not excerpts only
quality_criteria.applicability: Directly relevant to healthcare AI governance scenarios
